name: Braindoku: Sudoku Block Puzzle
description:
Braindoku is a block puzzle game that will train your brain and test your IQ! Place blocks in the 9x9 board and fill rows, columns, or squares to clear them from the game. Beat your high score and improve each day!

Clear blocks on every turn to earn Streak points! Clear multiple rows, regions, or squares to earn Combo points! Earn as many points as you can to beat your high score!

Our Features:
- Customizable backgrounds for every mood.
- Smooth graphics and Relaxing gameplay.
- Quick to understand rules, easy to control.
- Game for all ages.
- Small game size.
- Playable offline.

The classic block puzzle meets the sudoku in this addictive game that will help you to train your brain! Simple and addictive puzzle game for all ages.
